channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Custom Add User
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Custom Add User

item.title: CVE-2023-0043|2023-02-27T15:24:41.583Z -- unknown -- custom%20add%20user
item.description: The Custom Add User WordPress plugin through 2.0.2 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin
